group_1.textLeft: Hey! Those materials haven't been delivered yet!
Go help out with the float!

group_1.textRight: But chairman...! We can't afford to@repair it this year!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about that.
I managed to secure us a sponsorship!

group_1.textRight: Is that true?!

group_1.textLeft: That's right, so get those guys over here and@polish it up!

group_1.textRight: Yes sir!
The people are noisy, too...

group_1.textLeft: I apologize for that.
The local festival is about to begin, so we're@in the middle of preparations.

group_1.textRight: Festival...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, this area of Takarazaki is called Hikarizuka.
Haven't you ever heard of the Hikarizuka@Fire Festival?

group_1.textRight: No...
Me neither, I've never heard of any big@fire festivals around here.

group_1.textLeft: As I suspected... Despite its intensity, it's not@very well known.
And people are condemning it as dangerous,@so it's always at risk of disappearing.

group_1.textRight: But still, but still, it's important to perform@the festival the way it is!

group_1.textLeft: However, if we don't have the support, we won't@even be able to hold the festival...

group_1.textRight: I know, but...

group_1.textCenter: Oh, there you are. Everyone's been looking@for you.
Huh, and you've got a lot of girls with you.
Bridal candidates for the Youth Association?

group_1.textRight: Listen, I always tell you this, but that kind of@language is sexual harassment.

group_1.textLeft: Don't be so stiff.
I'd love to have you as my bride.
Ahahaha!
I apologize for the disruption.

group_1.textRight: This is a seriously bad place to chat, but you@took us all the way here anyway.
You wanted us to see this, didn'tcha?
You're really busy, so...if we help out here,@you'll join us...?

group_1.textLeft: No, I actually need your expertise in@hunting Witches.
I would like you to resolve the strange situation@in Takarazaki on our behalf.

group_1.textRight: So you really just wanna take advantage of us.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's correct.
Recently, there has been an increase in@crime and accidents in Takarazaki.
Solving this will be your task. I'll cooperate with@you if you succeed.

group_1.textRight: Kyahahaâ˜…
Protecting the festival and the people while testing@our skills. You can kill three birds with one stone.

group_1.textLeft: You're right about that.

group_1.textRight: Umm... Actually, my bag got snatched earlier@today...
And I don't think the culprit had a Witch's Kiss...

group_1.textLeft: Which makes this a rather complicated and@difficult task.
There's been a greater increase in crime than@Witches. It doesn't conform to normal trends.

group_1.textRight: Huh...

group_1.textLeft: Additionally, resolving the issue alone will not@be enough to guarantee my cooperation.
I'll also use this to determine whether or not@Aika is a suitable leader for me to follow.
I intend to judge how far the three of you,@including Miyabi and Azumi, will be able to go.
You have ten days before the festival begins.

group_1.textRight: Us, too...?!

group_1.textLeft: It's only natural, since you're carrying the@organization on your shoulders.

group_1.textRight: I don't want you to test cute lil' me too hard...

group_1.textLeft: Well, I suppose that's all from me.
If Miyu and I join, the Neo-Magius will have@more members.
It would become easier to recruit Feathers.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... Gimme a sec...

group_1.textLeft: Why did you suddenly close your eyes?@Does that mean you need to think it over?

group_1.textCenter: Ah, no... I think she's talking to her boyfriend...?

group_1.textLeft: Boyfriend?

group_1.textCenter: Oh, but I've never met him, since they@talk like that...

group_1.textLeft: L-Lady San...this girl scares me...

group_1.textRight: I seriously won't forgive anybody who@denies him.

group_1.textLeft: Eek, Lady San...!
That was quite impolite. So, what did@your boyfriend say?

group_1.textRight: He says I should take your test...even though@I don't feel like it...
Is this festival really such a big deal to you...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, this festival is more important to me than@life itself!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
More than life itself...
I see, I getcha...
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]The instructor feels totally sentimental right now!@I love it!
Then, Himena...

group_1.textLeft: I'll take the quiz to make you two join our gang.

group_1.narration: The time limit is 10 days from now.
I'll find the Witch causing trouble in Takarazaki@by then and take it down!

group_1.textCenter: Those two better prepare themselves, because@I'm definitely gonna bring 'em under my wing!

group_1.textRight: It's really starting...

group_1.textLeft: But, how are we supposed to find her if@there's no Witch's Kiss...
